code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useCart}from'./CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookCard=_ref=>{let{book}=_ref;const{addToCart}=useCart();const handleAddToCart=()=>{addToCart(book);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.imageUrl||'/placeholder-book.jpg',alt:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["by ",book.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$",book.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Stock: ",book.stock]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/book/".concat(book._id),className:"btn",children:"View Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddToCart,className:"btn",style:{marginLeft:'10px'},children:"Add to Cart"})]});};export default BookCard;
